BaseParam_1.Name: Silence Resistance

BaseParam_2.Description: Shortens the duration of blind.
BaseParam_2.Description_de: Resistenz gegen Blind: Beschleunigt die Erholung vom Status Blind.
BaseParam_2.Description_en: Shortens the duration of blind.
BaseParam_2.Description_fr: Réduit la durée de l'effet Cécité.
BaseParam_2.Description_ja: 暗闇の効果時間を短縮します。

BaseParam_3.Description_de: Resistenz gegen Gift: Beschleunigt die Erholung vom Status Gift.

BaseParam_3.Description_ja: 毒の効果時間を短縮します。

BaseParam_4.Description_de: Resistenz gegen Schlaf: Beschleunigt die Erholung vom Status Schlaf.
BaseParam_4.Description_fr: Réduit la durée de l'effet Sommeil.
BaseParam_4.Description_ja: 睡眠の効果時間を短縮します。
BaseParam_4.Name: Sleep Resistance

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 50 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 50.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード5
[レベル1～50の装備向け汎用修理材料］
Item_Repair.Name: Grade 5 Dark Matter
Item_Repair.Plural_fr: fragments de matière sombre grade V
Item_Repair.Singular_fr: fragment de matière sombre grade V

BaseParam_0.Description: Affects physical damage dealt by gladiator's arms, marauder's arms, pugilist's arms, lancer's arms, conjurer's arms, thaumaturge's arms, arcanist's arms, dark knight's arms, samurai's arms, red mage's arms, and astrologian's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_de: Stärke: Beeinflusst die Höhe des physischen Schadens, den die Waffen der Gladiatoren, Marodeure, Faustkämpfer, Pikeniere, Druiden, Thaumaturgen, Hermetiker, Dunkelritter, Samurai, Rotmagier und Astrologen austeilen.
BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects physical damage dealt by gladiator's arms, marauder's arms, pugilist's arms, lancer's arms, conjurer's arms, thaumaturge's arms, arcanist's arms, dark knight's arms, samurai's arms, red mage's arms, and astrologian's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts physiques des épées, épées à deux mains, haches, armes de corps à corps, armes d'hast, katana, rapières, bâtons, baguettes, grimoires et globes célestes.
BaseParam_0.Description_ja: 片手剣・両手斧・両手剣・格闘武器・両手槍・刀・呪具・魔道書・細剣・幻具・天球儀による物理攻撃力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_0.Name: Strength

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects physical ranged damage, damage dealt by rogue's arms.
BaseParam_1.Description_de: Geschick: Beeinflusst die Höhe des physischen Schadens, den die Waffen von Waldläufern, Schurken, Maschinisten und Barden austeilen.
BaseParam_1.Description_en: Affects physical ranged damage, damage dealt by rogue's arms.
BaseParam_1.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts physiques des dagues, arcs et armes à feu.
BaseParam_1.Description_ja: 双剣・弓・銃による物理攻撃力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_1.Name: Dexterity

BaseParam_2.Description: Affects attack magic potency when role is Tank or DPS.
BaseParam_2.Description_de: Intelligenz: Beeinflusst die Stärke der Offensivmagie von Verteidigern und Angreifern.
BaseParam_2.Description_en: Affects attack magic potency when role is Tank or DPS.
BaseParam_2.Description_fr: Influence la puissance magique offensive des tanks et des DPS.
BaseParam_2.Description_ja: 「Tank」ロールと「DPS」ロールの攻撃魔法威力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_2.Name: Intelligence

BaseParam_3.Description: Affects healing magic potency. Also affects attack magic potency when role is Healer.
BaseParam_3.Description_de: Willenskraft: Beeinflusst die Stärke der Heilmagie und die Stärke der Offensivmagie von Heilern.
BaseParam_3.Description_en: Affects healing magic potency. Also affects attack magic potency when role is Healer.
BaseParam_3.Description_fr: Influence la puissance magique offensive des soigneurs et la puissance de la magie curative.
BaseParam_3.Description_ja: 回復魔法威力と「Healer」ロールの攻撃魔法威力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_3.Name: Mind

BaseParam_4.Description_de: Konstitution: Beeinflusst die Höhe der maximalen Lebenspunkte (LP).
BaseParam_4.Description_ja: 最大HPに影響を与えます。
BaseParam_4.Name: Vitality

BaseParam_5.Description: Affects maximum MP. Only applicable when role is Healer.
BaseParam_5.Description_de: Frömmigkeit: Beeinflusst die Höhe der maximalen Magiepunkte (MP) von Heilern.
BaseParam_5.Description_en: Affects maximum MP. Only applicable when role is Healer.
BaseParam_5.Description_fr: Influence les PM maximums. Applicable uniquement aux classes/jobs de soigneurs.
BaseParam_5.Description_ja:
最大MPに影響を与えます。
「Healer」ロールにのみ効果を発揮します。
BaseParam_5.Name: Piety

BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects the amount of progress achieved in a single synthesis step.

製作での作業の進み方に影響します。

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 50 macht.

BaseParam_0.Description: Affects the rate at which items are gathered.
BaseParam_0.Description_de: Sammelgeschick: Beeinflusst die Sammelrate beim Sammeln. Je höher dieser Wert, desto wahrscheinlicher ist es, dass du einen Gegenstand erhältst.
BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects the rate at which items are gathered.
BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence le taux auquel les objets sont récoltés.
BaseParam_0.Description_ja:
採集でのアイテムの獲得率に影響します。
獲得力が高いほど、獲得率が高くなります。
BaseParam_0.Name: Gathering

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects the rate at which high-quality items are gathered.
BaseParam_1.Description_de: Wahrnehmung: Beeinflusst die HQ-Wahr<SoftHyphen/>schein<SoftHyphen/>lich<SoftHyphen/>keit beim Sammeln. Je höher dieser Wert, desto wahrscheinlicher ist es, dass du einen HQ-Gegenstand erhältst.
BaseParam_1.Description_en: Affects the rate at which high-quality items are gathered.
BaseParam_1.Description_fr: Influence le taux auquel les objets de haute qualité sont récoltés.
BaseParam_1.Description_ja:
採集でのアイテムのHQ獲得率に影響します。
識質力が高いほど、HQ獲得率が高くなります。
BaseParam_1.Name: Perception

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 50 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 50.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード5
[レベル1～50の装備向け汎用修理材料］
Item_Repair.Name: Grade 5 Dark Matter
Item_Repair.Plural_fr: fragments de matière sombre grade V
Item_Repair.Singular_fr: fragment de matière sombre grade V

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with simple items crafted from common materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-10.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 10 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with simple items crafted from common materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-10.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 10.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード1
[レベル1～10の装備向け汎用修理材料］
Item_Repair.Name: Grade 1 Dark Matter
Item_Repair.Plural_fr: fragments de matière sombre grade I
Item_Repair.Singular_fr: fragment de matière sombre grade I

It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 50 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 50.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード5
[レベル1～50の装備向け汎用修理材料］

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 50 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 50.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード5
[レベル1～50の装備向け汎用修理材料］
Item_Repair.Name: Grade 5 Dark Matter
Item_Repair.Plural_fr: fragments de matière sombre grade V
Item_Repair.Singular_fr: fragment de matière sombre grade V

name.jp: 手帳好きの剣術士

BaseParam_0.Description: Affects maximum HP.
BaseParam_0.Description_de: Konstitution: Beeinflusst die Höhe der maximalen Lebenspunkte (LP).
BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects maximum HP.
BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence les PV maximums.
BaseParam_0.Description_ja: 最大HPに影響を与えます。
BaseParam_0.Name: Vitality

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects the amount of physical and magical damage dealt and received, as well as HP restored. The higher the value, the more damage dealt, the more HP restored, and the less damage taken. Only applicable when role is Tank.
BaseParam_1.Description_de: Unbeugsamkeit: Je höher dieser Wert, desto höher der ausgeteilte Schaden durch physische und magische Attacken und regenerierte LP, und desto niedriger der erlittene Schaden. Nur bei Verteidigern wirksam.
BaseParam_1.Description_en: Affects the amount of physical and magical damage dealt and received, as well as HP restored. The higher the value, the more damage dealt, the more HP restored, and the less damage taken. Only applicable when role is Tank.
BaseParam_1.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts infligés et subis par les attaques physiques et magiques ainsi que les PV restaurés. Une valeur élevée augmente les dégâts infligés ainsi que les PV restaurés, et réduit les dégâts subis. Applicable uniquement aux classes/jobs de tanks.
BaseParam_1.Description_ja:
物理・魔法攻撃により与えるダメージ量や回復量と、自身が受けるダメージ量に影響を与えます。
不屈が高いほど与えるダメージ量と回復量が増加し、自身が受けるダメージ量が減少します。
「Tank」ロールにのみ効果を発揮します。
BaseParam_1.Name: Tenacity

BaseParam_2.Description: Affects the amount of physical and magical damage dealt, as well as HP restored. The higher the value, the higher the frequency with which your hits will be critical/higher the potency of critical hits.
BaseParam_2.Description_de: Kritischer Treffer: Je höher dieser Wert, desto wahrscheinlicher ist es, dass du einen kritischen Treffer landest, und desto höher ist der damit erzielte Schaden bzw. Heileffekt.
BaseParam_2.Description_en: Affects the amount of physical and magical damage dealt, as well as HP restored. The higher the value, the higher the frequency with which your hits will be critical/higher the potency of critical hits.
BaseParam_2.Description_fr: Augmente les dégâts infligés par les attaques physiques et magiques, ainsi que les PV restaurés. Une valeur élevée accroît la fréquence des critiques ainsi que la quantité de dégâts infligés ou de PV restaurés.
BaseParam_2.Description_ja:
物理・魔法攻撃により与えるダメージ量と回復量が増加します。
クリティカルが高いほど、クリティカルヒットが発生しやすくなり、ダメージ量と回復量が増加します。
BaseParam_2.Name: Critical Hit

name.jp: 手帳好きの格闘士

BaseParam_0.Description: Affects physical damage dealt by gladiator's arms, marauder's arms, pugilist's arms, lancer's arms, conjurer's arms, thaumaturge's arms, arcanist's arms, dark knight's arms, samurai's arms, red mage's arms, and astrologian's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_de: Stärke: Beeinflusst die Höhe des physischen Schadens, den die Waffen der Gladiatoren, Marodeure, Faustkämpfer, Pikeniere, Druiden, Thaumaturgen, Hermetiker, Dunkelritter, Samurai, Rotmagier und Astrologen austeilen.
BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects physical damage dealt by gladiator's arms, marauder's arms, pugilist's arms, lancer's arms, conjurer's arms, thaumaturge's arms, arcanist's arms, dark knight's arms, samurai's arms, red mage's arms, and astrologian's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts physiques des épées, épées à deux mains, haches, armes de corps à corps, armes d'hast, katana, rapières, bâtons, baguettes, grimoires et globes célestes.
BaseParam_0.Description_ja: 片手剣・両手斧・両手剣・格闘武器・両手槍・刀・呪具・魔道書・細剣・幻具・天球儀による物理攻撃力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_0.Name: Strength

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects the amount of damage dealt by both physical and magic attacks, as well as the amount of HP restored by healing spells.
BaseParam_1.Description_de: Ent<SoftHyphen/>schlos<SoftHyphen/>sen<SoftHyphen/>heit: Je höher dieser Wert, desto höher der ausgeteilte physische und magische Schaden und die Höhe der durch Magie geheilten LP.
BaseParam_1.Description_en: Affects the amount of damage dealt by both physical and magic attacks, as well as the amount of HP restored by healing spells.
BaseParam_1.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts infligés par les attaques physiques et magiques ainsi que le montant de PV restaurés par les sorts curatifs.
BaseParam_1.Description_ja:
物理・魔法攻撃により与えるダメージ量と回復量に影響を与えます。
意思力が高いほどダメージ量と回復量が増加します。
BaseParam_1.Name: Determination

BaseParam_2.Description: Affects both the casting and recast timers, as well as the damage over time potency for weaponskills and auto attacks. The higher the value, the shorter the timers/higher the potency.
BaseParam_2.Description_de: Schnelligkeit: Je höher dieser Wert, desto kürzer die (Re-)aktivierungszeit von Waf<SoftHyphen/>fen<SoftHyphen/>fer<SoftHyphen/>tig<SoftHyphen/>kei<SoftHyphen/>ten und desto höher der ausgeteilte physische Schaden über Zeit und physische Schaden durch Auto-Attacken.
BaseParam_2.Description_en: Affects both the casting and recast timers, as well as the damage over time potency for weaponskills and auto attacks. The higher the value, the shorter the timers/higher the potency.
BaseParam_2.Description_fr: Influence le temps de lancement et de recharge des techniques d'arme, et la puissance des attaques automatiques et des dégâts périodiques physiques. Une valeur élevée permet de réduire les temps de lancement et de recharge, et d'augmenter les dégâts périodiques et ceux des attaques automatiques.
BaseParam_2.Description_ja:
ウェポンスキルのキャストタイムやリキャストタイムと、物理攻撃のオートアタックおよび継続ダメージ効果が与えるダメージ量に影響を与えます。
スキルスピードが高いほど、ウェポンスキルのキャストタイムやリキャストタイムを短縮します。
加えてオートアタックと継続ダメージ効果のダメージ量が増加します。
BaseParam_2.Name: Skill Speed

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 50 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 50.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード5
[レベル1～50の装備向け汎用修理材料］
Item_Repair.Name: Grade 5 Dark Matter
Item_Repair.Plural_fr: fragments de matière sombre grade V
Item_Repair.Singular_fr: fragment de matière sombre grade V

item.Name_ja: マスターピュージリストリング
item.Singular_ja: マスターピュージリストリング

name.jp: 手帳好きの斧術士

BaseParam_0.Description: Affects maximum HP.
BaseParam_0.Description_de: Konstitution: Beeinflusst die Höhe der maximalen Lebenspunkte (LP).
BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects maximum HP.
BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence les PV maximums.
BaseParam_0.Description_ja: 最大HPに影響を与えます。
BaseParam_0.Name: Vitality

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects the rate at which your physical and magic attacks land direct hits, slightly dealing more damage than normal hits. The higher the value, the higher the frequency with which your hits will be direct.
BaseParam_1.Description_de: Direkter Treffer: Je höher dieser Wert, desto wahrscheinlicher ist es, dass deine physischen oder magischen Attacken einen direkten Treffer landen und mehr Schaden anrichten.
BaseParam_1.Description_en: Affects the rate at which your physical and magic attacks land direct hits, slightly dealing more damage than normal hits. The higher the value, the higher the frequency with which your hits will be direct.
BaseParam_1.Description_fr: Accroît les chances que les dégâts infligés par les attaques physiques et magiques soient augmentés. Une valeur élevée accroît la fréquence des coups nets.
BaseParam_1.Description_ja:
物理・魔法攻撃により与えるダメージ量が一定割合増加します。
ダイレクトヒットが高いほど、ダイレクトヒットが発生しやすくなります。
BaseParam_1.Name: Direct Hit Rate

BaseParam_2.Description: Affects the amount of physical and magical damage dealt and received, as well as HP restored. The higher the value, the more damage dealt, the more HP restored, and the less damage taken. Only applicable when role is Tank.
BaseParam_2.Description_de: Unbeugsamkeit: Je höher dieser Wert, desto höher der ausgeteilte Schaden durch physische und magische Attacken und regenerierte LP, und desto niedriger der erlittene Schaden. Nur bei Verteidigern wirksam.
BaseParam_2.Description_en: Affects the amount of physical and magical damage dealt and received, as well as HP restored. The higher the value, the more damage dealt, the more HP restored, and the less damage taken. Only applicable when role is Tank.
BaseParam_2.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts infligés et subis par les attaques physiques et magiques ainsi que les PV restaurés. Une valeur élevée augmente les dégâts infligés ainsi que les PV restaurés, et réduit les dégâts subis. Applicable uniquement aux classes/jobs de tanks.
BaseParam_2.Description_ja:
物理・魔法攻撃により与えるダメージ量や回復量と、自身が受けるダメージ量に影響を与えます。
不屈が高いほど与えるダメージ量と回復量が増加し、自身が受けるダメージ量が減少します。
「Tank」ロールにのみ効果を発揮します。
BaseParam_2.Name: Tenacity

BaseParam_0.Description: Affects physical damage dealt by gladiator's arms, marauder's arms, pugilist's arms, lancer's arms, conjurer's arms, thaumaturge's arms, arcanist's arms, dark knight's arms, samurai's arms, red mage's arms, and astrologian's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_de: Stärke: Beeinflusst die Höhe des physischen Schadens, den die Waffen der Gladiatoren, Marodeure, Faustkämpfer, Pikeniere, Druiden, Thaumaturgen, Hermetiker, Dunkelritter, Samurai, Rotmagier und Astrologen austeilen.
BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects physical damage dealt by gladiator's arms, marauder's arms, pugilist's arms, lancer's arms, conjurer's arms, thaumaturge's arms, arcanist's arms, dark knight's arms, samurai's arms, red mage's arms, and astrologian's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts physiques des épées, épées à deux mains, haches, armes de corps à corps, armes d'hast, katana, rapières, bâtons, baguettes, grimoires et globes célestes.
BaseParam_0.Description_ja: 片手剣・両手斧・両手剣・格闘武器・両手槍・刀・呪具・魔道書・細剣・幻具・天球儀による物理攻撃力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_0.Name: Strength

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects the amount of physical and magical damage dealt, as well as HP restored. The higher the value, the higher the frequency with which your hits will be critical/higher the potency of critical hits.
BaseParam_1.Description_de: Kritischer Treffer: Je höher dieser Wert, desto wahrscheinlicher ist es, dass du einen kritischen Treffer landest, und desto höher ist der damit erzielte Schaden bzw. Heileffekt.
BaseParam_1.Description_en: Affects the amount of physical and magical damage dealt, as well as HP restored. The higher the value, the higher the frequency with which your hits will be critical/higher the potency of critical hits.
BaseParam_1.Description_fr: Augmente les dégâts infligés par les attaques physiques et magiques, ainsi que les PV restaurés. Une valeur élevée accroît la fréquence des critiques ainsi que la quantité de dégâts infligés ou de PV restaurés.
BaseParam_1.Description_ja:
物理・魔法攻撃により与えるダメージ量と回復量が増加します。
クリティカルが高いほど、クリティカルヒットが発生しやすくなり、ダメージ量と回復量が増加します。
BaseParam_1.Name: Critical Hit

BaseParam_2.Description: Affects the amount of damage dealt by both physical and magic attacks, as well as the amount of HP restored by healing spells.
BaseParam_2.Description_de: Ent<SoftHyphen/>schlos<SoftHyphen/>sen<SoftHyphen/>heit: Je höher dieser Wert, desto höher der ausgeteilte physische und magische Schaden und die Höhe der durch Magie geheilten LP.
BaseParam_2.Description_en: Affects the amount of damage dealt by both physical and magic attacks, as well as the amount of HP restored by healing spells.
BaseParam_2.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts infligés par les attaques physiques et magiques ainsi que le montant de PV restaurés par les sorts curatifs.
BaseParam_2.Description_ja:
物理・魔法攻撃により与えるダメージ量と回復量に影響を与えます。
意思力が高いほどダメージ量と回復量が増加します。
BaseParam_2.Name: Determination

意思力が高いほどダメージ量と回復量が増加します。
BaseParam_1.Name: Determination

BaseParam_2.Description: Affects both the casting and recast timers for spells. The higher the value, the shorter the timers. Also affects a spell's damage over time or healing over time potency.
BaseParam_2.Description_de: Zaubertempo: Je höher dieser Wert, desto kürzer ist die Aktivierungs- und Re<SoftHyphen/>ak<SoftHyphen/>ti<SoftHyphen/>vie<SoftHyphen/>rungs<SoftHyphen/>zeit von Magie, desto schneller ist also ein Zauber (wieder) einsatzbereit.
BaseParam_2.Description_en: Affects both the casting and recast timers for spells. The higher the value, the shorter the timers. Also affects a spell's damage over time or healing over time potency.
BaseParam_2.Description_fr: Influence le temps de lancement et de recharge des sorts ainsi que les dégâts et effets curatifs périodiques de la magie. Une valeur élevée permet de réduire les temps de lancement et de recharge, et d'accroître les dégâts et effets curatifs périodiques.
BaseParam_2.Description_ja:
魔法のキャストタイムやリキャストタイムと継続ダメージ効果が与えるダメージ量、継続回復効果の効果量に影響を与えます。
スペルスピードが高いほど、魔法のキャストタイムやリキャストタイムを短縮します。
加えて継続ダメージ効果のダメージ量と継続回復効果の回復量が増加します。
BaseParam_2.Name: Spell Speed

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 50 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 50.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード5
[レベル1～50の装備向け汎用修理材料］
Item_Repair.Name: Grade 5 Dark Matter
Item_Repair.Plural_fr: fragments de matière sombre grade V
Item_Repair.Singular_fr: fragment de matière sombre grade V

BaseParam_0.Description_de: Intelligenz: Beeinflusst die Stärke der Offensivmagie von Verteidigern und Angreifern.
BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects attack magic potency when role is Tank or DPS.
BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence la puissance magique offensive des tanks et des DPS.
BaseParam_0.Description_ja: 「Tank」ロールと「DPS」ロールの攻撃魔法威力に影響を与えます。

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects healing magic potency. Also affects attack magic potency when role is Healer.
BaseParam_1.Description_de: Willenskraft: Beeinflusst die Stärke der Heilmagie und die Stärke der Offensivmagie von Heilern.
BaseParam_1.Description_en: Affects healing magic potency. Also affects attack magic potency when role is Healer.
BaseParam_1.Description_fr: Influence la puissance magique offensive des soigneurs et la puissance de la magie curative.
BaseParam_1.Description_ja: 回復魔法威力と「Healer」ロールの攻撃魔法威力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_1.Name: Mind

BaseParam_2.Description: Affects both the casting and recast timers for spells. The higher the value, the shorter the timers. Also affects a spell's damage over time or healing over time potency.
BaseParam_2.Description_de: Zaubertempo: Je höher dieser Wert, desto kürzer ist die Aktivierungs- und Re<SoftHyphen/>ak<SoftHyphen/>ti<SoftHyphen/>vie<SoftHyphen/>rungs<SoftHyphen/>zeit von Magie, desto schneller ist also ein Zauber (wieder) einsatzbereit.
BaseParam_2.Description_en: Affects both the casting and recast timers for spells. The higher the value, the shorter the timers. Also affects a spell's damage over time or healing over time potency.
BaseParam_2.Description_fr: Influence le temps de lancement et de recharge des sorts ainsi que les dégâts et effets curatifs périodiques de la magie. Une valeur élevée permet de réduire les temps de lancement et de recharge, et d'accroître les dégâts et effets curatifs périodiques.
BaseParam_2.Description_ja:
魔法のキャストタイムやリキャストタイムと継続ダメージ効果が与えるダメージ量、継続回復効果の効果量に影響を与えます。
スペルスピードが高いほど、魔法のキャストタイムやリキャストタイムを短縮します。
加えて継続ダメージ効果のダメージ量と継続回復効果の回復量が増加します。
BaseParam_2.Name: Spell Speed

BaseParam_3.Description: Affects the amount of physical and magical damage dealt, as well as HP restored. The higher the value, the higher the frequency with which your hits will be critical/higher the potency of critical hits.
BaseParam_3.Description_de: Kritischer Treffer: Je höher dieser Wert, desto wahrscheinlicher ist es, dass du einen kritischen Treffer landest, und desto höher ist der damit erzielte Schaden bzw. Heileffekt.
BaseParam_3.Description_en: Affects the amount of physical and magical damage dealt, as well as HP restored. The higher the value, the higher the frequency with which your hits will be critical/higher the potency of critical hits.
BaseParam_3.Description_fr: Augmente les dégâts infligés par les attaques physiques et magiques, ainsi que les PV restaurés. Une valeur élevée accroît la fréquence des critiques ainsi que la quantité de dégâts infligés ou de PV restaurés.
BaseParam_3.Description_ja:
物理・魔法攻撃により与えるダメージ量と回復量が増加します。
クリティカルが高いほど、クリティカルヒットが発生しやすくなり、ダメージ量と回復量が増加します。
BaseParam_3.Name: Critical Hit

BaseParam_0.Description: Affects physical damage dealt by gladiator's arms, marauder's arms, pugilist's arms, lancer's arms, conjurer's arms, thaumaturge's arms, arcanist's arms, dark knight's arms, samurai's arms, red mage's arms, and astrologian's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_de: Stärke: Beeinflusst die Höhe des physischen Schadens, den die Waffen der Gladiatoren, Marodeure, Faustkämpfer, Pikeniere, Druiden, Thaumaturgen, Hermetiker, Dunkelritter, Samurai, Rotmagier und Astrologen austeilen.
BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects physical damage dealt by gladiator's arms, marauder's arms, pugilist's arms, lancer's arms, conjurer's arms, thaumaturge's arms, arcanist's arms, dark knight's arms, samurai's arms, red mage's arms, and astrologian's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts physiques des épées, épées à deux mains, haches, armes de corps à corps, armes d'hast, katana, rapières, bâtons, baguettes, grimoires et globes célestes.
BaseParam_0.Description_ja: 片手剣・両手斧・両手剣・格闘武器・両手槍・刀・呪具・魔道書・細剣・幻具・天球儀による物理攻撃力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_0.Name: Strength

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects physical ranged damage, damage dealt by rogue's arms.
BaseParam_1.Description_de: Geschick: Beeinflusst die Höhe des physischen Schadens, den die Waffen von Waldläufern, Schurken, Maschinisten und Barden austeilen.
BaseParam_1.Description_en: Affects physical ranged damage, damage dealt by rogue's arms.
BaseParam_1.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts physiques des dagues, arcs et armes à feu.
BaseParam_1.Description_ja: 双剣・弓・銃による物理攻撃力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_1.Name: Dexterity

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 50 macht.

It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. BaseParam_0.Description: Affects the rate at which items are gathered.

BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence le taux auquel les objets sont récoltés.

採集でのアイテムの獲得率に影響します。
獲得力が高いほど、獲得率が高くなります。

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects the rate at which high-quality items are gathered.

識質力が高いほど、HQ獲得率が高くなります。

item.Description: Rumor has that fishing enthusiast Biggs used the Garlond Ironworks crafting facilities after-hours to create this magitek-enhanced rod.
item.Description_de: Gerüchten zufolge soll der lei<SoftHyphen/>den<SoftHyphen/>schaft<SoftHyphen/>liche Angler Biggs die Gar<SoftHyphen/>lond-Me<SoftHyphen/>tall<SoftHyphen/>wer<SoftHyphen/>ke nach Feierabend dafür genutzt haben, diese Magitek-verstärkte Angelrute zu bauen.
item.Description_en: Rumor has that fishing enthusiast Biggs used the Garlond Ironworks crafting facilities after-hours to create this magitek-enhanced rod.
item.Description_fr: Étant passionné de pêche, Biggs des Forges de Garlond a employé tout son savoir de la technologie magitek pour créer cet outil.
item.Description_ja: 釣り好きのガーロンド・アイアンワークス社・社員ビッグスが、魔導技術の全てをつぎ込んで開発した高性能釣竿

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 50 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from high-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-50.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 50.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード5
[レベル1～50の装備向け汎用修理材料］
Item_Repair.Name: Grade 5 Dark Matter
Item_Repair.Plural_fr: fragments de matière sombre grade V
Item_Repair.Singular_fr: fragment de matière sombre grade V

Benutze diesen Gegenstand, um den Parade-Chocobo zu rufen.

BaseParam_0.Description: Affects physical ranged damage, damage dealt by rogue's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_de: Geschick: Beeinflusst die Höhe des physischen Schadens, den die Waffen von Waldläufern, Schurken, Maschinisten und Barden austeilen.
BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects physical ranged damage, damage dealt by rogue's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts physiques des dagues, arcs et armes à feu.
BaseParam_0.Description_ja: 双剣・弓・銃による物理攻撃力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_0.Name: Dexterity

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects the amount of physical and magical damage dealt, as well as HP restored. The higher the value, the higher the frequency with which your hits will be critical/higher the potency of critical hits.
BaseParam_1.Description_de: Kritischer Treffer: Je höher dieser Wert, desto wahrscheinlicher ist es, dass du einen kritischen Treffer landest, und desto höher ist der damit erzielte Schaden bzw. Heileffekt.
BaseParam_1.Description_en: Affects the amount of physical and magical damage dealt, as well as HP restored. The higher the value, the higher the frequency with which your hits will be critical/higher the potency of critical hits.
BaseParam_1.Description_fr: Augmente les dégâts infligés par les attaques physiques et magiques, ainsi que les PV restaurés. Une valeur élevée accroît la fréquence des critiques ainsi que la quantité de dégâts infligés ou de PV restaurés.
BaseParam_1.Description_ja:
物理・魔法攻撃により与えるダメージ量と回復量が増加します。
クリティカルが高いほど、クリティカルヒットが発生しやすくなり、ダメージ量と回復量が増加します。
BaseParam_1.Name: Critical Hit

BaseParam_2.Description: Affects the amount of damage dealt by both physical and magic attacks, as well as the amount of HP restored by healing spells.
BaseParam_2.Description_de: Ent<SoftHyphen/>schlos<SoftHyphen/>sen<SoftHyphen/>heit: Je höher dieser Wert, desto höher der ausgeteilte physische und magische Schaden und die Höhe der durch Magie geheilten LP.
BaseParam_2.Description_en: Affects the amount of damage dealt by both physical and magic attacks, as well as the amount of HP restored by healing spells.
BaseParam_2.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts infligés par les attaques physiques et magiques ainsi que le montant de PV restaurés par les sorts curatifs.
BaseParam_2.Description_ja:
物理・魔法攻撃により与えるダメージ量と回復量に影響を与えます。
意思力が高いほどダメージ量と回復量が増加します。
BaseParam_2.Name: Determination

BaseParam_Special_0.Description: Affects the amount of damage taken by physical attacks. The higher the value, the less damage taken.

BaseParam_Special_0.Description_en: Affects the amount of damage taken by physical attacks. The higher the value, the less damage taken.
BaseParam_Special_0.Description_fr: Influence le montant de dégâts reçus lorsqu'une attaque physique est subie. Une défense élevée permet de subir moins de dégâts.
BaseParam_Special_0.Description_ja:
物理攻撃を受けた際のダメージを軽減します。
物理防御力が高いほど、物理攻撃によって受けるダメージが小さくなります。
BaseParam_Special_0.Name: Defense

BaseParam_Special_1.Description: Affects the amount of damage taken by magic attacks. The higher the value, the less damage taken.
BaseParam_Special_1.Description_de: Magieabwehr: Je höher dieser Wert, desto weniger Magieschaden erleidest du.
BaseParam_Special_1.Description_en: Affects the amount of damage taken by magic attacks. The higher the value, the less damage taken.
BaseParam_Special_1.Description_fr: Influence le montant de dégâts reçus lorsqu'une attaque magique est subie. Une défense magique élevée permet de subir moins de dégâts.
BaseParam_Special_1.Description_ja:
攻撃魔法を受けた際のダメージを軽減します。
魔法防御力が高いほど、魔法攻撃によって受けるダメージが小さくなります。
BaseParam_Special_1.Name: Magic Defense

It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with simple items crafted from common materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-10.]

BaseParam_0.Description: Affects physical damage dealt by gladiator's arms, marauder's arms, pugilist's arms, lancer's arms, conjurer's arms, thaumaturge's arms, arcanist's arms, dark knight's arms, samurai's arms, red mage's arms, and astrologian's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_de: Stärke: Beeinflusst die Höhe des physischen Schadens, den die Waffen der Gladiatoren, Marodeure, Faustkämpfer, Pikeniere, Druiden, Thaumaturgen, Hermetiker, Dunkelritter, Samurai, Rotmagier und Astrologen austeilen.
BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects physical damage dealt by gladiator's arms, marauder's arms, pugilist's arms, lancer's arms, conjurer's arms, thaumaturge's arms, arcanist's arms, dark knight's arms, samurai's arms, red mage's arms, and astrologian's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts physiques des épées, épées à deux mains, haches, armes de corps à corps, armes d'hast, katana, rapières, bâtons, baguettes, grimoires et globes célestes.
BaseParam_0.Description_ja: 片手剣・両手斧・両手剣・格闘武器・両手槍・刀・呪具・魔道書・細剣・幻具・天球儀による物理攻撃力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_0.Name: Strength

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects physical ranged damage, damage dealt by rogue's arms.
BaseParam_1.Description_de: Geschick: Beeinflusst die Höhe des physischen Schadens, den die Waffen von Waldläufern, Schurken, Maschinisten und Barden austeilen.
BaseParam_1.Description_en: Affects physical ranged damage, damage dealt by rogue's arms.
BaseParam_1.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts physiques des dagues, arcs et armes à feu.
BaseParam_1.Description_ja: 双剣・弓・銃による物理攻撃力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_1.Name: Dexterity

BaseParam_2.Description: Affects attack magic potency when role is Tank or DPS.
BaseParam_2.Description_de: Intelligenz: Beeinflusst die Stärke der Offensivmagie von Verteidigern und Angreifern.
BaseParam_2.Description_en: Affects attack magic potency when role is Tank or DPS.
BaseParam_2.Description_fr: Influence la puissance magique offensive des tanks et des DPS.
BaseParam_2.Description_ja: 「Tank」ロールと「DPS」ロールの攻撃魔法威力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_2.Name: Intelligence

BaseParam_3.Description: Affects healing magic potency. Also affects attack magic potency when role is Healer.
BaseParam_3.Description_de: Willenskraft: Beeinflusst die Stärke der Heilmagie und die Stärke der Offensivmagie von Heilern.
BaseParam_3.Description_en: Affects healing magic potency. Also affects attack magic potency when role is Healer.
BaseParam_3.Description_fr: Influence la puissance magique offensive des soigneurs et la puissance de la magie curative.
BaseParam_3.Description_ja: 回復魔法威力と「Healer」ロールの攻撃魔法威力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_3.Name: Mind

BaseParam_4.Description_de: Konstitution: Beeinflusst die Höhe der maximalen Lebenspunkte (LP).
BaseParam_4.Description_ja: 最大HPに影響を与えます。
BaseParam_4.Name: Vitality

BaseParam_5.Description: Affects maximum MP. Only applicable when role is Healer.
BaseParam_5.Description_de: Frömmigkeit: Beeinflusst die Höhe der maximalen Magiepunkte (MP) von Heilern.
BaseParam_5.Description_en: Affects maximum MP. Only applicable when role is Healer.
BaseParam_5.Description_fr: Influence les PM maximums. Applicable uniquement aux classes/jobs de soigneurs.
BaseParam_5.Description_ja:
最大MPに影響を与えます。
「Healer」ロールにのみ効果を発揮します。
BaseParam_5.Name: Piety

name.en: Between a Rock and a Hard Place I
name.jp: シールロック：ランク1

BaseParam_0.Description: Affects physical damage dealt by gladiator's arms, marauder's arms, pugilist's arms, lancer's arms, conjurer's arms, thaumaturge's arms, arcanist's arms, dark knight's arms, samurai's arms, red mage's arms, and astrologian's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_de: Stärke: Beeinflusst die Höhe des physischen Schadens, den die Waffen der Gladiatoren, Marodeure, Faustkämpfer, Pikeniere, Druiden, Thaumaturgen, Hermetiker, Dunkelritter, Samurai, Rotmagier und Astrologen austeilen.
BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects physical damage dealt by gladiator's arms, marauder's arms, pugilist's arms, lancer's arms, conjurer's arms, thaumaturge's arms, arcanist's arms, dark knight's arms, samurai's arms, red mage's arms, and astrologian's arms.
BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts physiques des épées, épées à deux mains, haches, armes de corps à corps, armes d'hast, katana, rapières, bâtons, baguettes, grimoires et globes célestes.
BaseParam_0.Description_ja: 片手剣・両手斧・両手剣・格闘武器・両手槍・刀・呪具・魔道書・細剣・幻具・天球儀による物理攻撃力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_0.Name: Strength

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects physical ranged damage, damage dealt by rogue's arms.
BaseParam_1.Description_de: Geschick: Beeinflusst die Höhe des physischen Schadens, den die Waffen von Waldläufern, Schurken, Maschinisten und Barden austeilen.
BaseParam_1.Description_en: Affects physical ranged damage, damage dealt by rogue's arms.
BaseParam_1.Description_fr: Influence les dégâts physiques des dagues, arcs et armes à feu.
BaseParam_1.Description_ja: 双剣・弓・銃による物理攻撃力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_1.Name: Dexterity

BaseParam_2.Description: Affects attack magic potency when role is Tank or DPS.
BaseParam_2.Description_de: Intelligenz: Beeinflusst die Stärke der Offensivmagie von Verteidigern und Angreifern.
BaseParam_2.Description_en: Affects attack magic potency when role is Tank or DPS.
BaseParam_2.Description_fr: Influence la puissance magique offensive des tanks et des DPS.
BaseParam_2.Description_ja: 「Tank」ロールと「DPS」ロールの攻撃魔法威力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_2.Name: Intelligence

BaseParam_3.Description: Affects healing magic potency. Also affects attack magic potency when role is Healer.
BaseParam_3.Description_de: Willenskraft: Beeinflusst die Stärke der Heilmagie und die Stärke der Offensivmagie von Heilern.
BaseParam_3.Description_en: Affects healing magic potency. Also affects attack magic potency when role is Healer.
BaseParam_3.Description_fr: Influence la puissance magique offensive des soigneurs et la puissance de la magie curative.
BaseParam_3.Description_ja: 回復魔法威力と「Healer」ロールの攻撃魔法威力に影響を与えます。
BaseParam_3.Name: Mind

BaseParam_4.Description_de: Konstitution: Beeinflusst die Höhe der maximalen Lebenspunkte (LP).
BaseParam_4.Description_ja: 最大HPに影響を与えます。
BaseParam_4.Name: Vitality

BaseParam_5.Description: Affects maximum MP. Only applicable when role is Healer.
BaseParam_5.Description_de: Frömmigkeit: Beeinflusst die Höhe der maximalen Magiepunkte (MP) von Heilern.
BaseParam_5.Description_en: Affects maximum MP. Only applicable when role is Healer.
BaseParam_5.Description_fr: Influence les PM maximums. Applicable uniquement aux classes/jobs de soigneurs.
BaseParam_5.Description_ja:
最大MPに影響を与えます。
「Healer」ロールにのみ効果を発揮します。
BaseParam_5.Name: Piety

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from superior-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-60.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 60 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from superior-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-60.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 60.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード6
[レベル1～60の装備向け汎用修理材料］
Item_Repair.Name: Grade 6 Dark Matter
Item_Repair.Plural_fr: fragments de matière sombre grade VI
Item_Repair.Singular_fr: fragment de matière sombre grade VI

item.Description:
Another advanced Allagan creation. Is there anything the Allagans couldn't create? The Allagans are believed to have created an instrument to answer this very question.

Use item to acquire the clockwork Twintania minion.
item.Description_de:
Noch so eine fortschrittliche Kreation der Allager. Gibt es irgendwas, das die Allager nicht herstellen konnten? Gerüchten zufolge haben sie ein Gerät gebaut, um genau diese Frage zu beantworten.

Benutze diesen Gegenstand, um den Uhrwerk-Twintania zu rufen.
item.Description_en:
Another advanced Allagan creation. Is there anything the Allagans couldn't create? The Allagans are believed to have created an instrument to answer this very question.

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with simple items crafted from common materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-10.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 10 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with simple items crafted from common materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-10.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 10.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード1
[レベル1～10の装備向け汎用修理材料］

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with simple items crafted from common materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-10.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 10 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with simple items crafted from common materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-10.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 10.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード1
[レベル1～10の装備向け汎用修理材料］
Item_Repair.Name: Grade 1 Dark Matter
Item_Repair.Plural_fr: fragments de matière sombre grade I
Item_Repair.Singular_fr: fragment de matière sombre grade I

BaseParam_0.Description: Affects the amount of progress achieved in a single synthesis step.
BaseParam_0.Description_de: Kunst<SoftHyphen/>fer<SoftHyphen/>tig<SoftHyphen/>keit: Beeinflusst den Fortschritt der Synthese. Je höher dieser Wert, desto schneller geht die Synthese voran.
BaseParam_0.Description_en: Affects the amount of progress achieved in a single synthesis step.
BaseParam_0.Description_fr: Influence la progression réalisée lors d'un tour d'une synthèse.
BaseParam_0.Description_ja:
製作での作業の進み方に影響します。
作業精度が高いほど、作業が多く進みます。
BaseParam_0.Name: Craftsmanship

BaseParam_1.Description: Affects the amount of quality improved in a single synthesis step.
BaseParam_1.Description_de: Kontrolle: Beeinflusst die Qualität bei der Synthese. Je höher dieser Wert, desto schneller steigt die Qualität an.
BaseParam_1.Description_en: Affects the amount of quality improved in a single synthesis step.
BaseParam_1.Description_fr: Influence la qualité réalisée lors d'un tour d'une synthèse.
BaseParam_1.Description_ja:
製作での品質の上がり方に影響します。
加工精度が高いほど、品質が多く上がります。
BaseParam_1.Name: Control

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from superior-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-60.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 60 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from superior-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-60.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 60.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード6
[レベル1～60の装備向け汎用修理材料］
Item_Repair.Name: Grade 6 Dark Matter
Item_Repair.Plural_fr: fragments de matière sombre grade VI
Item_Repair.Singular_fr: fragment de matière sombre grade VI

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶
[武具投影に必要]
Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from superior-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-60.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 60 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with precisely crafted items made from superior-quality materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-60.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 60.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード6
[レベル1～60の装備向け汎用修理材料］
Item_Repair.Name: Grade 6 Dark Matter

This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with simple items crafted from common materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-10.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 10 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with simple items crafted from common materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-10.]

他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード1

Item_Glamour.Description:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_de:
Ein kleiner Kristall, der magische Lichtstrahlen flicht und Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen eine andere Erscheinung geben kann.
Erforderlich für Projektionen.
Item_Glamour.Description_en:
This crystalline prism captures the likeness of a piece of equipment and projects it onto another object of comparable form and function.

[Necessary to project glamours.]
Item_Glamour.Description_fr:
Ce bloc de cristal taillé projette de la lumière, permettant de créer une illusion.
[Permet de créer une illusion pour un équipement]
Item_Glamour.Description_ja:
魔法の光で記憶させた武具の幻影を映し出す小結晶

Item_Glamour.Name: Glamour Prism

Item_Repair.Description:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with simple items crafted from common materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-10.]
Item_Repair.Description_de: Diese mysteriöse Substanz kann Materie assimilieren und sämtliche Eigenschaften der kopierten Materie über<SoftHyphen/>nehmen, was sie zu einem perfekten Material für Reparaturen von Aus<SoftHyphen/>rüstungs<SoftHyphen/>gegen<SoftHyphen/>ständen der Stufen 1 bis 10 macht.
Item_Repair.Description_en:
It has recently been discovered that this substance of unknown origin has the faculty to assimilate with other forms of matter, effectively restoring them to their original condition. This specific grade of dark matter has been shown to bond best with simple items crafted from common materials.

[Used to repair equipment for levels 1-10.]
Item_Repair.Description_fr: Un minerai réagissant à l'énergie spirituelle, et qui a des facultés d'assimilation avec d'autres matières. Convient aux équipements de niveau 1 à 10.
Item_Repair.Description_ja:
他物質への同化特性を持つ精神感応型物質。グレード1
[レベル1～10の装備向け汎用修理材料］
Item_Repair.Name: Grade 1 Dark Matter
Item_Repair.Plural_fr: fragments de matière sombre grade I
Item_Repair.Singular_fr: fragment de matière sombre grade I
